identity.name: pmx
identity.oneLiner: pmx is a terminal-first AI product operating system that turns your Git repo into plans, specs, docs, and tickets via an interactive CLI “AI PM”.
identity.domain: Developer tooling / AI-assisted product management (Product Ops)
identity.stack: Node.js, TypeScript (ESM), Commander, React Ink, OpenAI SDK, Zod, fs-extra (file-based JSON), MCP SDK (Jira integration), tsup
